text: @LaurentDTardif The man took a 95% percent pay cut for this year to help other people instead of pushing a ball in front of a screaming audience....  You've got to admire his values. I do not care if COVID-19 is dangerous or not... Many people would sell their children for that money.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.description: An athlete in the world, like Serena Williams or Lionel Messi
